Major Legislative Enactments of 2022: 17.  Article 121 of the Constitution is hereby amended in paragraph (1) of that Article, by the substitution, for the words “within
one week” of the words “within fourteen days”.
18.  Article 153 of the Constitution is hereby amended as follows:-

Part IV: (1)   by the substitution, in paragraph (1) of that Article, for the words and figures “subject to the provisions of Article 41A,” of

Major Legislative Enactments of 2022: the words “subject to the approval of the Constitutional Council,”; and

Part IV: (2)  by the substitution, in paragraph (4) of that Article, for the words and figures “subject to the provisions of Article 41A,” of

Major Legislative Enactments of 2022: the words “subject to the approval of the Constitutional Council,”.
